decoworld.model.world.entities.combat

Class CombatEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.world.entities.WorldEntity
      • decoworld.model.world.entities.combat.StatEntity
        • decoworld.model.world.entities.combat.CombatEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasSync, HasCombat, HasHealth, HasStats, StatListener, HasLevel, HasLocation, HasRotation, WorldItem, java.lang.Iterable<StatType>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AmmoCrate, Arrow, Crate, FastArrow, FountainOfHealth, HealthPack, MobRocket, PlayerPet, PvpEntity, ResourceNode, Ticket, WarriorMob, Yralemounts, Zombiemounts

    public abstract class CombatEntity
extends StatEntity
implements HasCombat, HasLevel
    CombatEntity provides a generic implementation for a WorldItem that inherits the HasCombat interface.

        public boolean equipItem(EquipablePlayerItem item)
        By P3TE! Equips the desired item - and applies effects that are associated with that item.
        Parameters:
        item - - The item you want to equip.
        Returns:
        true if it is possible to equip the Item. false if the slots are currently full.

      • unequipItem

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        null - (if there was no Item in that slot. The Item that was in that slot.) EquipablePlayerItem - The item that was previously in that slot.
